plainText.description: All nodes converted into single line of text

accessToken.description: Token used to access protected resources on behalf of a user. Format: `Authentication: Bearer {access_token}`

refreshToken.description: Token used to obtain new access token. Format: `Authentication: Bearer {refresh_token}`

apiKey.description: Can be obtained via instance dashboard. Format: `Authentication: ApiKey {key_id}.{key_secret}`
